summary: hi, i’m dikshita, a first-year student at iiit bangalore. today, june 1st, my summer holidays began. i joined a driving school — first class went well. i just returned from a paris learning trip to avancity with dinesh sir who is head of artificail Intelligence and data Science Department and 13 batchmates (may 12–24). it was amazing — learned a lot, explored, and made great friends. i live with my parents, natraj and lalitha, and my younger brother, omkar (6th grade). that’s all for today!
